name: muvee Reveal X Project File
summary: Learn about .RVL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Movies created by muvee Reveal X can be exported to Facebook, YouTube, DVD, mobile devices, and custom video file formats including .WMV, .MOV, .MPG, .AVI, and .MP4.

NOTE: RVL files do not store actual video and audio data. They only store references to audio and video files included with the project. Therefore, if you want to share a project, you will need to share the audio and video files separately as well. RVL files use a plain text XML format.

description: Movie project created by muvee Reveal X, a program used for making home videos; saves a list of photos, videos, and music for the movie; also includes the presentation style that shows different transitions and effects.
